name: Elderand
storyline: The game has a heavy focus on skill-based combat. Reckless explorers will be punished time after time. Do not be afraid, your timing and positioning will improve as you find your battle style. Discover, buy, and conquer tons of items as you cross strange worlds. Unique relics, potions, weapons, shields, and some resources that are still untouched. Take good care of your income, shopkeepers have loads of material to bargain. Slay filthy creatures, find hidden passages, and befriend strangers from the Errant Breach to Omulore. Your journey will be filled with an extensive amount of ancient mysteries. As you uncover your path, remember one thing, curiosity is your greatest ally.
summary: Experience a Lovecraftian inspired story-driven action RPG game with skill-based combat. Explore and Fight in a dreadful world rich in treasures and deadly creatures. Elderand is a love letter to Castlevania with modern elements. Make your own path as you unveil the darkness.
